jobDescription: Find similar career opportunities Category:  Analytics and Emerging Digital Technologies City:  Washington, District of Columbia, United States Position ID:  J0817-0056 Employment Type:  Full Time Position Description:Help CGI develop the next generation of mission-enabling applications for one of our federal clients. We are seeking Data Analysts to support our Federal Regulatory Business Unit in the DC metro area. Our team is focused on delivering results. Be a part of our industry leading team, delivering measurable business value to our client through technology solutions focused on their business needs. We are looking for people with deep financial industry expertise, analytical capabilities and an innovative mindset to solve problems.
